title: The Croak 500
description: (Bedtime Stories For Kids Ages 4-8)This book is an early readers book from ages 3- 8 years old. It is about two best friends that enter a race called THE CROAK 500. Ted and Raymond look to make a car but find out Ted's grandfather had one. They fixed it up before the race and work real hard together. Ted tries to win the race but something happens.... Have fun reading.
author: Rhonda Patton
